caption: Marcos Leite
infobox-image: Marcos Leite Pepperdine.jpg | Leite as a junior at Pepperdine

Career information: Selected by the Portland Trail Blazers

Career highlights and awards: FIBA Intercontinental Cup champion (1979) | 2× South American Club champion (1978, 1979) | 3× Brazilian champion (1979, 1983, 1989) | 3× São Paulo State champion (1978, 1979) | 6× Rio de Janeiro State champion (1970-1974, 1984) | 3× All-American Honorable Mention (1974-1976) | WCAC Player of the Year (1976) | 2× First-team All-WCAC (1975, 1976) | Second-team All-WCAC (1974) | WCAC Freshman of the Year (1974)

Pan American Games: Bronze medal - third place | 1975 Mexico City
Bronze medal - third place | 1979 San Juan
